newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Dec 24.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London-based Arab newspapers - Dec 24.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Egyptian delegation offers projects worth $12.8 billion to Saudi investors.
- Saudi and international companies plan to invest more than 225 million riyals to build a petrochemical plant in Yanbu.
- Qatar expects natural gas income to exceed oil income in the next decade.
- Bahrain, Kuwait and Oman to sign agreement to link their bourses this week.
